short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate human-like comments for products on platforms like ProductHunt with AI, making it easy to express your thoughts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Human Comment is a Chrome extension designed to help users quickly generate human-like comments for products on platforms similar to ProductHunt. By integrating the powerful AI, this extension can generate high-quality comment suggestions based on the product description and other comments. Whether you are an entrepreneur, developer, or product enthusiast, this extension helps you easily participate in discussions and share your opinions.
